description: Bangers and mash are always a hit. But when the sausages are premium beef and the mash is seasoned with iconic Vegemite, the dish is even better.
keywords: Beef Sausages With Vegemite Mashed Potato
name: Beef Sausages With Vegemite Mashed Potato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place gravy powder in a small jug. Add 1 cup boiling water and stir until slightly thickened. Serve sausages on mash with beans and gravy, and seasoned with pepper.
